profile.headline: Fine Artist | AI Art Innovator | Portland
profile.occupation: Freelance Fine Artist | Muralist | Art Instructor
profile.about: Fine Artist blending traditional techniques with AI and data science. Passionate about generative art, computer vision, and art market analytics.

author.name: Jordan Mitchell
author.headline: Fine Artist | AI Art Innovator | Portland

content.text:
Solo Exhibition - This has been a milestone in my artistic journey, bringing together my passion for traditional painting and digital innovation. My solo show at Spectrum Gallery features 20 pieces that explore the intersection of human creativity and algorithmic patterns.

I'm deeply grateful to gallery director Elena Rodriguez and my technical collaborator Dr. Ben Carter for their unwavering support and inspiration throughout this creative process.

The exhibition is more than just a display of artwork; it's a conversation about the future of art and technology. I'm excited to share this body of work with the community and continue pushing the boundaries of what's possible in art.

author.name: Jordan Mitchell
author.headline: Fine Artist | AI Art Innovator | Portland

content.text:
Thrilled to share the completion of my AI Art Style Transfer Tool project! Built with TensorFlow, this application bridges traditional artistry with cutting-edge technology, allowing real-time artistic style transformation.

This project represents my commitment to exploring how machine learning can enhance and expand creative expression. The tool is now available on my GitHub for fellow artists and developers to experiment with.
